quotes.quote: Did you say fireflies? Ugh...[sigh]
The island of the Mosquibees
The island of the volcano
Do you know where the Mosquibee village is at?
Do you know where I could find the Mosquibees?
I asked Mr. Monk how to get to the Mosquibees, and he told me to ask you about the ferryman.
I'm trying to find the Mosquibees. Can you help me out?
But, I am only trying to go to the Mosquibees...
No thank you, honest!
Hey! how can I find the Queen of the Mosquibees?
I went shopping. Be back soon. Signed: your housemaid.
What a weird painting, looks like a monster from the gas.
Ugh, taste in home decor is rather lame.
Dark Monk's chapel.
I don't have enough gems.
Hello
Hi
Hello
Your Majesty, I've come to free you, and ask you to open the door to the passage which leads to island CX. My planet's being threatened and I have to save it.
"You are entering the domain of the Wannies."
Ferryman if you please, @ take me across the raging seas, @ for a few gems, I take your boat, @ I cannot swim, I cannot float!!
You're at the Building Company, in front of the gem mine.
You're at the ferryman's lane.
You're in the village of the Wannies.
Hello. Won't you come in and share our meal?
So? How do you like my firefly tart?
Dinner is served!
Feeling better? Well, it's the first time I find somebody who does not like my tart!!
Would you like another slice of tart?
I hope the military are not going to come back and wreak havoc here. Since their passage, I haved a tough time finding fireflies for my tarts.
He bothering me!!
Whoever wants to cross the ocean of fire must pay the price. Four gems is the fare. @ Where do you want to go?
Help me...
Ah, thank you, thank you! I'd fallen and couldn't get up. What can I do to thank you?

She's locked up in the premises of the Building Company, the entrance of which is heavily guarded. But from the mine, you can access the nearest hangar. And from there, if you take the roof, you can reach the building where she's being held.
Be careful Twinsen, all the soldiers are looking for you.
Here, as a token of my gratitude, I'm giving you this glove. It protects us from fire and lets us get the gems out of the molten lava without burning up.
Here, to thank you, take this gem.
Hey, pal! Say, if you bring me back a slice of tart, I'll tell you a pretty wacky secret.
Oh, thanks a bunch, pal! Listen, this kid, he give me the key to the chapel. Here, take it. I've had enough fun with it.
That was one hummer of a tart! My boy, 'e sez that I shouldn't eat none 'cause it could make me sick. But that's all a bunch of hogwash. Phooey, I sez.
Hi, pal! Hey, is that you who brought on all this military? They don't look all that strong, if you ask me. In my day, it was different. They fed us firefly tarts, that really built us up!!!
Say, I've heard that them Mosquibees got ambushed. Pretty sure they took shelter in the cave near the waterfall at the foot of the volcano.
Very well. But first, being that you're a stranger, I must warn you.

Once, long ago, our god, Dark Monk, condemned us, the people of Zeelich, to live forever on our planet which he then turned into hell so as to make it seem more of a real condemnation. Each of the four races received a fragment of a key. These must be reunited during a great ceremony. And when our people have atoned for their sins, Dark Monk will rid us of the curse and give Zeelich back its original appearance. Today, he's returned and we all await the next and last ceremony. Twinsen, do not dare interfere with the religious practice of our people.
For that, you'll have to call on the ferryman's services. He provides the only communication between the islands and the under-gas. Go see my housemaid. She shall tell you how to proceed.
But it's you who took our fragment. You don't realize what you have done. Listen carefully.
The time of the ceremony is near. Dark Monk in person will chase away the monsters of the gas cloud when we reunite the four fragments for the last time.
The time of the ceremony is near. Now that you have taken our fragment, Dark Monk will not chase the monsters of the gas or the cloud which blankets Zeelich!
Oh, my, that's pretty far, no. You see, none of us have ever left our island or our beloved old mine.
My mommy, she's helping Mr. Monk make Dark Monk come back. And then, when he's here, heads are gonna roll! It'll be so awesome!! My mommy's strong!!
Waah!!!

Of course, it's fairly simple. You have to pay him in gems if you want him to take you. But first you have to call him. To do that, you have to stand at the end of the ferryman's pier and call him with this song. Listen to me and don't forget.
Ferryman if you please, take me across the raging seas, for a few gems, I take your boat, I cannot swim, I cannot float!!

The Monk impatiently awaits the ceremony of the celebration. It's a major event for our entire population. It represents the end of the curse which lies heavily upon Zeelich. We shall at last resume the course of our lives on a hospitable planet, not in this forlorn place.

Ah, yes, right. Only thing is, they don't live on this island, sir. You have to go to the wharf and call the ferryman. I've never actually seen him, but this rumor has an air of truth. Ask the Monk, he'll be able to answer you.
I'm in a bind, I've lost my glove in the mine. With it, I can catch the pieces of lava and the balls of fire, I can even pitch them back. Everybody has one, to extract gems.
The Monk, he threw me out of his choir. It's not fair, I didn't do anything. So I stole the key to the chapel! So I boxed it in and gave it to the old man!
I fish fireflies used to bake tarts. It's awfully good you know, a firefly tart.
I can always look for gems around here, there are none. Nothing doing, they can only be found in the mine. And yet, I was told that they were easy to find on the other islands.

I knew the Mosquibees live away from the rest, but they must've done something pretty drastic for the emperor to send his army. It's being whispered they're looking for a criminal hostile to Dark Monk!!
Hmmf! Lost my glove somewhere in the mine. Now I can't reach into the lava to grab up the gems.
No time.
Hi.
Leave me alone.
Hello.
Twinsen!!

You're very brave, but I've got face the emperor. Soon I'll be transferred to his palace, and he'll come to interrogate me. So I suppose I'll just stay here. Here! Take the key to the passage! Go and save your people!!
Hurry, Twinsen!! You have to penetrate to island CX. The entrance is behind our village! Use it! Quickly!
Only you can stop the emperor and Dark Monk.
Don't stay here! Escape while you still can!
The Monk punished our buddy Johnny 'cause he lost the key to the chapel. Wasn't even true.
Let's get this over with, so we can go and see the soldiers.
As for me, I'm real glad the Monk punished this Johnny. He had it coming he was always making fun of me.
I sure hope the army wasted this Johnny. Or, better yet, maybe they fed him to the ferryman!!
Look, this job is too much drudgery for us to want to talk about it!
Here, there is no hope. All we do is dig. That's all.
Watch out!!
You don't have business here, get lost!!!
Welcome to the Building Company, sir. If you're here to make a cash deposit, we can take care of it right away.
Er... good day... sir... I'm the manager of this institution. You were let in without an appointment? I take it then you're here to deposit an obscenely large sum of money?
No, have mercy!!
Easy, Twinsen, be careful. It's not the time to break this precious fragment!!
Please leave now and close the door! Here, as we say, "Idle hands make the Devil's workshop!!!"
